```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(gapminder)
```

```{r}
data("gapminder")
```

```{r}
ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
gapminder %>% 
  filter(year == 2015 & country %in% c("Sri Lanka","Turkey")) %>% 
  select(country, gdpPercap)
```
